title: Frequency Response Measure
description: The median of all Frequency Response observations reported annually.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > The median of all the [Frequency Response](/wiki/frequnecy-response) observations reported **annually** by [Balancing Authorities](/wiki/balancing-authority) or Frequency Response Sharing Groups for frequency events specified by the ERO. This will be calculated as **MW/0.1Hz**.
